docs.text: Welcome to the homepage of Weitian Xing I am currently a 1st-term MASc(Master of Applied Science) student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Waterloo , my advisor is Prof. Werner Dietl . Before that, I received my B.S. in Electronic Information Science and Technology from Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications . My Chinese name is 邢维天(Xing Weitian). Click here to hear the pronunciation of my first name. Find me at: Github News Sep 2019 - Dec 2019: TA of SE464: Software Architecture and Design (19 fall). Research Interest I am currently working on PICO , a pluggable type system based on Checker Framework . Industry Experience Apr 2018 - Jun 2018, Python R&D Engineer Intern at Nanjing Guiji Zhineng Technology . Oct 2017 - Jan 2018, Python R&D Engineer Intern at Nanjing Walkyren Network Technology . Contact Me Click here to see the contact information.
